name: B-Line 7DRL
description:
Thanks for playing my 2019 7DRL entry. I was inspired by how similar my emotions felt between the roguelike and battle royale genres. The search for items, the unknown encounters around each corner, and the hunger clock- be it a enclosing ring or a dwindling food supply- are shared by both genres and form a very similar core to me. I wanted to explore that more by bringing some of the battle royale mechanics into a roguelike. Hope you enjoyed!

Follow me on Twitter at @IAmSlogo or comment here.
